titleStmt.title: Ho auto-katakritos. The self-condemned. Or, a letter to Mr Jo: Goodwin: shewing, that in his essay to justifie the equity, and regularnes of the late, and present proceedings of the Army by principles of reason, and religion, he hath condemned himselfe of iniquity, and variablenesse in the highest degree, untill he shall explaine himself in publike. / By Sir Francis Nethersole Knight.
titleStmt.author: Nethersole, Francis, Sir, 1587-1659.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Goodwin, John. The Army harmelesse.
First word of title in Greek characters.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
